trans-unit.source: Provides the capabilities for matching annotations with the corresponding annotated objects.
trans-unit.target: Fornece as capacidades para a correspondência anotações com os objetos anotados correspondentes.

trans-unit.source: IAnchorInfo is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)] version 3.5.

trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [versões e dependências](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets the anchor of the annotation.
Anchor is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)] version 3.5.

trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [versões e dependências](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
A âncora de que está resolvida.

trans-unit.source: Annotation is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)] version 3.5.

trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [versões e dependências](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets the object that represents the location on the tree where the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.IAnchorInfo.Anchor*> is resolved.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto que representa a localização na árvore onde o <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.IAnchorInfo.Anchor*>for resolvido.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.IAnchorInfo.Anchor*>

trans-unit.source: ResolvedAnchor is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)] version 3.5.

trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [versões e dependências](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The object that represents the location on the tree where the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.IAnchorInfo.Anchor*> is resolved.
trans-unit.target: O objecto que representa a localização na árvore onde o <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.IAnchorInfo.Anchor*>for resolvido.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.IAnchorInfo.Anchor*>

trans-unit.source: The type is specified by the type of the annotated object.
trans-unit.target: O tipo é especificado pelo tipo de objeto anotado.

trans-unit.source: Sticky notes and highlights in flow or fixed documents always resolve to a <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.TextAnchor"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Temporária notas e realces no fluxo ou documentos fixos sempre resolver para um <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.TextAnchor"> </xref> objeto.
